name: Drona Drone Shop
description: It is Drone website for people to search various drone and purchase it.It is a mern stack website where user and admin will see separate dashboard to do different activities.
Feature1: On the home page, users can see the popular products, dynamic reviews, and featured sections.
feature2: Created with Email and Password-based login system. If the user wants to buy a product, he has to log in with his account. If he has no account he has to register first by clicking on the register button
feature3: Designed Admin and Customers dashboard separately. After login, the user can see ordered products on the dashboard and he can also review this website from the dashboard. Admin can add products, manage products and manage orders from his dashboard.

name: Travele Tour Agency
description: It is travel booking website.Authentication system has been implemented.Users can choose his best travel packages and book it. He also can see his ordered and manage it.Admin can
Feature1: Designed home page with banner, Packages, additional services, client testimonial, and footer.
feature2: Created with Google Sign-in login system. If the user clicks on book now he will see the package details but he has to log in first. After login, he can book a package by providing his information.
feature3: By clicking Add package, All Bookings and My Booking menu can do different activities as shown.

name: Medicare Hospital Ltd
description: It is Hospital website.Users can route to different pages from nav bar. Users can also see all doctors and appointment system.Authentication system has been implemented
Feature1: On the home page, users can see main services, lab services, and patient testimonials.
feature2: Created with a routing system so that users can go to doctors page, About page, and login page by clicking on navbar menu.
feature3: Created with Email-Password and google sign-in login system. To see the details of the services and appointments, the user has to log in first.
